                                        int playerDamage)
        addEnemyToLevel: It is in charge of adding an enemy to a specific level.
        Parameters:
        level: - int => This is the level where the enemy will be added.
        name: - String => It is the name of the enemy to be added.
        enemyType: - int => This is the type of enemy into which the enemy will be classified.
        defeatScore: - int => It is the score that will be given to the player if he defeats the enemy.
        playerDamage: - int => It is the score that will be taken away from the player if he is hit by the enemy.
        Returns:
        msgConfirmation: String => It is the confirmation message that will correctly add the enemy.
